Subskills.name: Ignition
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by pickup raid.

Subskills.name: Oil Leak
Subskills.description: All raid participants leak oil on the ground.

Subskills.name: Suicide Squad
Subskills.description: The raid now moves towards target location exploding into multiple big explosions and truck tires rolling into all directions.

Subskills.name: Billy & Little Bob
Subskills.description: Adds a motorcycle rider to the pickup raid firing buckshots.

Subskills.name: Shattering Shells
Subskills.description: Buckshots from the motorcycle rider now inflict fire break on hit.

Subskills.name: V12 Engine
Subskills.description: Increases travel speed of all raid members.

Subskills.name: Moonshine Miles
Subskills.description: Adds a wooden airplane to the pickup raid dropping bombs dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Napalm Filling
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Tarethiel MC
Subskills.description: Now only send motorcycle riders firing buckshot inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Crackling Fire
Subskills.description: Bombs dropped by the wooden airplane now inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Speed Dial
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of pickup raid.

Subskills.name: Double Barrel
Subskills.description: Pickup truck now fires additional projectiles.

Subskills.name: Drunken Air Raid
Subskills.description: Now only send a raid of planes that fire projectiles and drop bombs.
